original_text: If they did not offer it to the Lord at the Tent of Meeting's door, they are sinning. You must send them away from the camp.
korean_text: 회막 문으로 가져다가 여호와께 드리지 아니하면 그는 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: If they did not offer it to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 주님께 그것을 드리지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: at the Tent of Meeting's door
